item_content: To what extent is your knowledge on the Spanish media?
item_answers:
(a) A huge extent 
 (b) Quite a huge extent 
 (c) An average extent 
 (d) Quite a limited extent 
 (e) A limited extent 
 (f) Not sure

item_content: Through which media, the Spanish or English, do you most frequently retrieve the most updated news?
item_answers:
(a) Spanish media 
 (b) English media 
 (c) Both 
 (d) Not sure
